EmailTemplate.subject: Valued WEX Fleet One cardholder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This month marks your anniversary as a valued Fleet One cardholder, and we wanted to mark the occasion with a sincere “Thank You” for your loyalty. It is our goal to make EVERY cardholder a LIFETIME cardholder. REMINDER: Our Customer Care department is always open and here for you at 800.359.7587, if you have any questions or if you need a little help along your route.
Thank you for allowing us to meet your fleet management needs. It is our sincere pleasure to do business with {!Account.Name}.
